content: भिद् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (भिंदति) To divide or cut into parts. {vII.v} {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> ( भिनत्ति, भिंत्ते, बिभेद, बिभिदे, अभैत्सीत्, अभिदत्, अभित्त, भेत्स्यति-ते, भेत्तुं, भिन्न) {@--1@} To break, cleave, split, cut asunder, rend, pierce, break through or down; अतिशीतलमप्यंभः किं भिनत्ति न भूभृतः <ls>H. 3. 45</ls>; तेषां कथं नु हृदयं न भिनत्ति लज्जा <ls>Mu. 3. 34</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 39</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 33</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 93</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 77.</ls> {@--2@} To dig or tear up, excavate; <ls>U. 1. 23.</ls> {@--3@} To pass through; <ls>Pt. 1. 211</ls>, <ls n="Pt. 1.">212.</ls> {@--4@} ({%a%}) To divide, separate; द्विधा भिन्ना शिखंडिभिः <ls>R. 1. 39.</ls> ({%b%}) To displace; <ls>R. 14. 3.</ls> {@--5@} To violate, transgress, break, infringe; समयं लक्ष्मणोऽभिनत् <ls>R. 15. 94</ls>; निहतश्च स्थितिं भिंदन् दानवोऽसौ बलद्विषा <ls>Bk. 7. 68.</ls> {@--6@} To remove, take away; <ls>Śi. 15. 87.</ls> {@--7@} To disturb, interrupt; as in समाधिभेदिन्. {@--8@} To change, alter; (न) भिंदंति मंदां गतिमश्वपुख्यः <ls>Ku. 1. 11</ls>; or विश्वासोपगमादभिम्नगतयः शब्दं सहंते मृगाः <ls>Ś. 1. 14.</ls> {@--9@} To expand, cause to open or blossom, open; सूर्यांशुभिर्भिन्नमिवारविंदं <ls>Ku. 1. 32</ls>; नवोषसा भिन्नमिवैकपंकजं <ls>Ś. 7. 16</ls>; <ls>Me. 107.</ls> {@--10@} To disperse, scatter, scare away; भिन्नसारंगयूथः <ls>Ś. 1. 33</ls>; <ls>V. 1. 16.</ls> {@--11@} To disjoin, disunite, set at variance; <ls>Mu. 3. 13.</ls> {@--12@} To loosen, relax, dissolve; पर्यंकबंधं निबिडं बिभेद <ls>Ku. 3. 59.</ls> {@--13@} To disclose, divulge. {@--14@} To perplex, distract. {@--15@} To distinguish, discriminate. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} (भिद्यते) {@--1@} To be split, rent or shivered; <ls>Mk. 5. 22</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 139.</ls> {@--2@} To be divided or separated. {@--3@} To expand, blossom, open. {@--4@} To be loose or relaxed; प्रस्थानभिन्नां न बबंध नीविं <ls>R. 7. 9</ls>, <ls n="R. 7.">66.</ls> {@--5@} To be different from (with <ab>abl.</ab>); <ls>R. 5. 37</ls>; <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--6@} To be destroyed. {@--7@} To be divulged or betrayed, get abroad; षट्कर्णो भिद्यते मंत्रः &c. <ls>Pt. 1. 99.</ls> {@--8@} To be harassed, pained or afflicted. {@--9@} To be frightened or alarmed; <ls>Pt. 1. 102.</ls> {@--10@} To separate oneself from, keep aloof from. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (भेदयति-ते) {@--1@} To split, cleave, divide, tear &c. {@--2@} To destroy, dissolve. {@--3@} To disunite, set at variance. {@--4@} To perplex. {@--5@} To seduce. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (बिभित्सति-ते) To wish to break &c.
भिद् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Breaking, splitting; destroying &c. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Breaking, splitting, dividing. {@--2@} Difference. {@--3@} A sort, kind.
